content: Feng Liu | Drexel CCI Skip to main content Feng LiuAssistant Professor Pronouns: he/him/his/himselfComputer Science Emailfl397@drexel.eduWebsite(s)liufeng2915.github.ioCurriculum VitaeDownload PDF Feng LiuAssistant Professor Pronouns: he/him/his/himselfComputer ScienceBiographyFeng Liu is an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science at Drexelâ€™s College of Computing & Informatics (CCI). Prior to joining Drexel's faculty, he worked as a Postdoctoral Researcher at Michigan State University's Department of Computer Science and Engineering. He has made significant advancements in the fields of computer vision, machine learning and vision-based human-AI interaction. His research covers a wide range of areas, including 3D scene understanding, versatile and controllable AIGC, biometric recognition techniques such as face and gait recognition, and person re-identification.
